remarks: The collection of all sets of the form ` F ( z ) = { y e. S | z C_ y } ` , which can be read as the set of all finite subsets of ` A ` which contain ` z ` as a subset, for each finite subset ` z ` of ` A ` , form a filter base.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tsmsfbas.s $e |- S = ( ~P A i^i Fin ) $.
tsmsfbas.f $e |- F = ( z e. S |-> { y e. S | z C_ y } ) $.
tsmsfbas.l $e |- L = ran F $.
tsmsfbas.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. W ) $.
tsmsfbas $p |- ( ph -> L e. ( fBas ` S ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d S y z $.
